attributes.action: Release Sue Gray report in full, before the police report is released.
attributes.background: Release Sue Gray report to the British public.

rejection.details:
Freedom of Information requests cannot be submitted by petition. You can find out how to make a freedom of information (FOI) request here: https://www.gov.uk/make-a-freedom-of-information-request

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Make sure the report into 'partygate' is published in full with the evidence: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606960
